title: Gan Gan Ganko-chan
synopsis: The anime follows a boy named Gen, who time travels from the year 2020 to a distant future where humanity has gone extinct. He begins staying at the Ganko family home in the Rustling Forest, where he has none of the amenities he is used to: no electricity, gas, or running water, as well as no television, smartphones, convenience stores, snacks, or games.
staff: [['Yoda, Nobutaka', ['Director', ' Music']], ['Mieno, Hitomi', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Matsuki, Daisuke', ['Director of Photography', ' Art Director']]]
